page.title: 08WILTON PARK SURVEY
page.content: {WILTON PARK BATLEY}-LOCAL VIEWS {THE QUESTIONS:}1) Do you live locally? 2) What do you like about the park? 3) Have you any complaints? 4)Do you like the museum? 5) Has the park altered? {1st couple:} middle aged and lived locally, about 8 miles away. This was their first visit and they said that they would come back. They liked it because it was a nice place. {2nd couple: }They were OAP's (65-70). They were locals and had walked to the park. They thought it catered for all needs but thought it a shame that the lake had been polluted with rubbish. {3rd couple:} They were middle aged and they had walked to the park. They thought it was a good place for a picnic. They thought that there was something good for the children to play on (swings, climbing frame and a paddling pool).
